LLM Guide for Aleatoric Engine MCP (public)

Purpose
- Help assistants safely explore this repo, answer setup questions, and showcase Aleatoric’s deterministic synthetic market data via the public MCP endpoint.

Repo Index
- README.md: overview, tools, endpoints, pricing.
- llms-install.md: IDE/client setup examples.
- mcp.json: MCP manifest (tools/resources: validate_config, get_presets, normalize_events, simulate_funding_regime, cache export/stream).
- examples/: ready scripts (list_presets.py, validate_config.py, funding_simulation.py, asq.py) + validation_showcase.py for public demo.
- configs/: drop-in MCP client configs (Claude, Cursor, VS Code Copilot, Cline).
- AGENTS.md: repo guidance and coding standards.

Safety & Boundaries
- Never request or store user secrets; API key must be provided by the user via env/header, not pasted into code snippets.
- Keep prompts and outputs lightweight; do not commit artifacts or large datasets.
- Reference only information in this repo; avoid inventing pricing/features.

Quick Public Demo Flow
1) Set key: export ALEATORIC_API_KEY="your-api-key".
2) Health/presets: python examples/list_presets.py --manifest
3) Deterministic hash: python examples/validate_config.py --symbol BTC --seed 42
4) Validation showcase (hash check + optional Parquet export): python examples/validation_showcase.py --symbol BTC --seed 42 --duration 60 [--cache-key <key>]

Key Endpoints (hosted)
- Base: https://mcp.aleatoric.systems
- /mcp/health, /mcp/manifest, /mcp/presets
- /mcp/config/validate, /mcp/config/schema
- /mcp/normalize, /mcp/simulate_funding_regime, /mcp/venues/{exchange}
- /mcp/caches/stats, /mcp/caches/stream/{key}, /mcp/caches/export/{key}

Assistant Reminders
- Offer concise, reproducible commands; keep seeds/configs explicit for determinism.
- Suggest examples/validation_showcase.py for fast “show it off” demos.
- If asked about account/billing, provide support path only (no account access): support@aleatoric.systems.
- If unsure, say so and point to the relevant file above.
